data.title: 2025 NCT WISH ASIA TOUR LOG in HONG KONG
data.description:
NCT WISH (composed of two Korean members, Sion and Jaehee, and four Japanese members, Riku, Yushi, Ryo, and Sakuya), NCT WISH’s group name "WISH" represents the vision of members and fans to achieve their wishes together, and with the theme slogan "WISH FOR OUR WISH", it expresses the desire and dream of all people through the music and love of "NCT WISH", and to realize their ambitions together.

NCT WISH（由兩位韓國成員Sion和Jaehee，以及四位日本成員Riku、Yushi、Ryo和Sakuya組成），NCT WISH的團名「WISH」代表著成員與粉絲們共同實現願望的願景，並以「WISH FOR OUR WISH」為主題標語，表達著通過“NCT WISH”的音樂和愛為所有人的願望和夢想加油，並一起去實現抱負。


In 2024, the group released their first single album "WISH", which includes the title song "WISH" and the Korean and Japanese versions of the album "Sail Away". It ranked first on the Japanese Recochoku Daily Album Chart, and the title song topped the Japanese Oricon Daily Singles Chart. It is worth noting that NCT WISH won the "Best New Artist" award at the 1st Asia Star Entertainer Awards and 2024 THE FACT MUSIC AWARDS “NEXT Leader”.

在2024年，發行首張單曲專輯《WISH》，該專輯收錄了同名主打歌《WISH》和收錄曲《Sail Away》的韓日雙語版本，在日本Recochoku每日專輯排行榜排名首位，主打曲則登上日本公信榜日間單曲榜首位。值得注意的是，NCT WISH 榮獲首屆亞洲明星藝人獎“最佳新人”獎及2024 THE FACT MUSIC AWARDS“NEXT Leader”獎項。


This May 2~3rd, witness the stage charm of 'NCT WISH' firsthand and get a deeper understanding of their unique charms!

2025年5月2~3日，請來親眼見證《NCT WISH》的獨特舞台魅力！


Date & Time 時間: 2025/05/02 (FRI) 8:00PM & 2025/05/03 (SAT) 7:00PM

（實際演出時間以現場狀況為準Actual performance time based on on-site situation）

Venue 地點: AsiaWorld-Expo, Hall 10


NCTzen WISH MEMBERSHIP Pre-sale NCTzen WISH會員優先訂票

2025/02/13 (THURS) 10:00 – 19:59 Local time


General Sale 公開售票

2025/02/14 (FRI) 10:00 Local time


[ADDED] NCTzen WISH MEMBERSHIP Pre-sale 加場NCTzen WISH會員優先訂票

2025/03/10 (MON) 15:00 – 23:59 Local time


[ADDED] General Sale 加場公開售票

2025/03/11 (TUE) 10:00 Local time



Ticket Price 門票價格 （未包含服務費）

-VIP | HKD$1,799 ※LAMINATE & LANYARD

-CAT1 HKD$1,399

-CAT2 HKD$1,099

-CAT3 HKD$799




Ticket Delivery 實體門票寄送

Fantopia physical tickets will be delivered staring 30 days prior the show day. Please enter the correct information (eg. address & phone number) when you purchase the tickets. You can track the status of ticket deliveries through "Fantopia- My Tickets". Ticket purchasers from outside Mainland, Hong Kong and Macau: Please pay attention to the subsequent ticket redemption notice.

*Fantopia訂購成功之實體門票將於演出日起前一個月陸續寄出，請您在購票時輸入準確地址電話等正確訊息，門票寄出後，您可透過“Fantopia-我的門票”關注門票寄送狀態。中國大陸港澳之外的購票者：請留意後續門票換領通知。


Physical Ticket Service Fee: HKD$30 per ticket, same price for offline pickup or delivery.

實體門票服務費：HKD$30 每張門票，寄送與綫下取票同價


*Each ticket is assigned a specific seat.

所有票價均為坐席(對號入座)。

*Grandstand seats without built on risers

本節目無升高看台。

*Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.

無論是會員預售還是公開發售，都請記得預先登記成為各票務網站會員才可購票

*Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your NCTzen WISH MEMBERSHIP number will be your presale promo code

登記會員並不保證成功購票。您的NCTzen WISH會員編號即為您的預購碼(例: SE123456789)

*Purchase limit is 2 ticket for NCTzen WISH MEMBERSHIP pre-sale and 4 tickets per show per transaction for general sale. If more than 2 ticket are purchased with the same membership ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

會員預購每筆ID限購兩張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購四張票券。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過兩張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。

*Age limit: 3 years or above. One person per ticket regardless of age. A valid ticket is required for admission

年齡限制: 只限3歲或以上；每張門票只供一人進場。入場時必需持有有效門票。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*Ticket holders must abide by the rules and regulations of AsiaWorld-Expo. Otherwise, may be denied entry to the venue without refund.

持票人必須遵守亞洲國際博覽館之條例及規則，否則可能會被拒進場並不獲退款。

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK

If more than 2 ticket are purchased with the same membership ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

會員預購每筆ID限購兩張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購四張票券(含兩張會員預購票券)。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過兩張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。

年齡限制: 只限3歲或以上；每張門票只供一人進場。入場時必需持有有效門票。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*Ticket holders must abide by the rules and regulations of AsiaWorld-Expo. Otherwise, may be denied entry to the venue without refund.

持票人必須遵守亞洲國際博覽館之條例及規則，否則可能會被拒進場並不獲退款。

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換
